item.title: App Design: Make sure yours saves settings (MobileRSS)
item.description: Have you ever used an app, thought you saved the settings and then you check and nothing changes - It happens all the time with MobileRSS.

item.title: Android apps run full screen on Honeycomb Tablets
item.description: Google recently announced some exciting new features for Android 3.

item.title: Last.fm Android Live Wallpaper
item.description: I’ve just discovered the (not official) Last.fm live wallpaper for Android.
